body_html:
Here's a output of running a pytorch implementaton of Ross Girshick's Faster R-CNN taken from: https://github.com/ruotianluo/pytorch-faster-rcnn/

I had to make some changes to the non-maxima suppression routine which is implemented as a C extension to get it to work on windows, but other than that, the code pretty much worked as-is. Obviously, without @peterjc123 it would not have been possible to do this on windows. @peterjc123, can't thank you enough for all your hard work.

I had to make some changes to the non-maxima suppression routine which is implemented as a C extension to get it to work on windows, but other than that, the code pretty much worked as-is. Obviously, without @peterjc123 it would not have been possible to do this on windows. @peterjc123, can't thank you enough for all your hard work.
body:
Here's a output of running a pytorch implementaton of Ross Girshick's Faster R-CNN taken from: https://github.com/ruotianluo/pytorch-faster-rcnn/
![det3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6232547/33223174-d8441c44-d122-11e7-8584-df2b4437b0f1.png)


I had to make some changes to the non-maxima suppression routine which is implemented as a C extension to get it to work on windows, but other than that, the code pretty much worked as-is. Obviously, without @peterjc123 it would not have been possible to do this on windows. @peterjc123, can't thank you enough for all your hard work.
